reporting_cycle: Midterm report by 9 November 2011, final report by 30 days prior to termination of mandate
summary: The Security Council, recalling previous relevant resolutions, including 1696 (2006), 1737 (2006), and 1929 (2010), and the President's statement of 29 March 2006, reaffirms their provisions. The Council extends the mandate of the Panel of Experts, established under resolution 1929 (2010), until 9 June 2012. The Panel is to provide a midterm report to the Committee by 9 November 2011 and to the Council by 9 December 2011, and a final report to the Committee 30 days prior to the termination of its mandate. The Panel must provide a planned program of work to the Committee within 30 days of appointment and any updates thereto. The Council urges all States and relevant UN bodies to cooperate fully with the Committee and Panel, providing information on implementation of measures imposed by relevant resolutions. The Council remains actively seized of the matter.
